title: Shap TreeExplainer(model).shap_interaction_values returns None for LightGBM Regressor
body:
Hello,
My dataset has categorical and numerical data both. I am using LGBMRegressor. In below code, where i want to know the feature interaction, it returns None. 

shap_interaction_values = shap.TreeExplainer(trained_model).shap_interaction_values(x_test.iloc[:2000,:])

My guess, is it is due to below, that i found in tree.py
https://github.com/slundberg/shap/blob/dc936d0497ae37ae223e8b4287c786eb10959cd4/shap/explainers/tree.py

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/50363246/80855568-d023a480-8c5f-11ea-8070-bacef4cdca9a.png)

Could you please update the treeexplainer for categorical data too? or suggest alternatives. because if i try to convert categorical to Numerical encoding, i think it could be misinterpreted by algorithm. The other option would be one hot encoding, but consolidating the summary for such one hot encoded columns into 1 column (i.e pre one hot encoding) would be an overhead.
